channel.title: CHICAS News
channel.description: Latest Information from the CHICAS Stats/Epi group at Lancaster

item.title: CHICAS at TIES2016, Edinburgh, July 2016
item.description: Dr Luigi Sedda has organised an invited session for the International Environmetrics Society conference (TIES) on Vector-borne disease mapping.

item.title: CHICAS Partnership with Liverpool Tropical Medicine Creates New PhD Opportunities
item.description: Our successful MRC application has resulted in a number of fully-funded studentships in quantitative and translational research for Global Health.

item.title: PhD Student Wins TakeAIM Prize
item.description: Justice Aheto has won a prize that recognises the value and impact of his research on malnutrition in Ghana.

item.title: Geostat Summer School at Lancaster
item.description: The Geostat Summer School was held in Lancaster from the 16th to the 23rd.

item.title: Chris Jewell Featured in Nvidia's GPU blog
item.description: Chris has been interviewed for the Nvidia "CUDA Zone" blog, talking about his epidemic modelling work.
